metadata.title: The Joy Of Life Dog and Cat Silicone Food Grade Lick Mat and Slow Feeder w/ Strong suctions for Boredom, Anxiety Reduction and Oral Health. (Large, Orange)
features: ✅ YOUR PET WILL LOVE IT: The Joy Of LIfe Studies show repetitive licking increases endorphins, which in turn calms your pet helping dog anxiety. A great alternative to slow feeder dog bowls use our dog food mat to curb destructive behavior during stressful times.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN AND USE: Paste the pad on the bathtub, counter or any smooth surface, just apply peanut butter or pet snacks on the dog peanut butter feeder pad. Easy to clean, it can be safely placed in the dishwasher or washed with hot water.

✅ FUN HEALTH BENEFITS: Great for cat and dog dental care at home, our dog lick mat and cat food mat promotes fresh breath by scraping the tongue. It also improves digestion by slowing down their eating. Just sprinkle dog calming chews - anxiety relief treats as a special snack.

✅ THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: Our quadrant design helps guide portion control when spreading cat food, dog treats, dog snacks, or wet dog food on our dog lick pad. The raised patterns provide different texture options sure to keep your pet engaged. Not meant for aggressive chewers.

✅ WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW: Easy to clean and top rack dishwasher safe. Our dog lick mat is proudly made in the USA and comes with a 90 day limited warranty for pet chewing. ALWAYS SUPERVISE YOUR PET WHILE USING. Please watch our video for more info.
description: The Joy Of Life Dog and Cat Silicone Food Grade Lick Mat and Slow Feeder w/ Strong suctions for Boredom, Anxiety Reduction and Oral Health.
